data.title: 40 Power Metal Bands Lesson
data.meta_description: In this lesson I covered the style of 40 power metal bands in one song. Metal - power lesson by Gabriel Leopardi.
data.text:
Gabriel Leopardi

QUOTE (patbpat @ Nov 30 2013, 12:11 PM)

I am 50 years old, never had a lesson but this piece is just spectacular took me 7 weeks to get it up to speed, still have trouble with the dragonforce but I try and make something fit. my friends can't believe it when I play this for them,, Thank you soooo much!!!!

Wou! This sounds great! I'm really curious to see you playing it. I'm sending you a PM right now! check it out!

patbpat

I am 50 years old, never had a lesson but this piece is just spectacular took me 7 weeks to get it up to speed, still have trouble with the dragonforce but I try and make something fit. my friends can't believe it when I play this for them,, Thank you soooo much!!!!

Gabriel Leopardi

Gabriel Leopardi

Hey guys!! Thanks a lot for the comments. It has been a very nice experience to get back to my teenage years when I was all day listening to power metal bands. This music style make me have a very tight technique and developed my melodic side a lot, not only as a guitarist, also as a composer. I hope that you enjoy listening and learning this lesson as much as I did while I was composing it.

If you are a Power Metal fan, be sure to check my two series:

German Power Metal

Finnish Power Metal

Headbanger

Awesome!! Well done Gab, very inspiring!!
